Sniper

Sniper aims his two Rifles at Oblitrons back. He yells in his
comlink. 
"Oblitron, this is a Maximal. Let my friends go and I might let you 
go. Might I remind you the I'm quicker and Have better aim then you! 
So leave or get shot by the expert."
